name: Project Archivist
description:
Find your way through lost messages, hidden mysteries, and your loved one's memories in our cozy little console-style search game inspired by Her Story. Find keywords, solve the mystery, and retrieve the hidden fate of the world.

While some documents can be searched by matching words, most of them are hidden behind certain keywords, find and hit the correct keyword to pop these.

But beware, time is not on your side. The archive changes over time ... the system is trying to stop you, delaying you from the inevitable moment of enlightenment. Good luck :)

Credits:

Writers: Mauve Spillard, Evan Ibarra

Artist: Evan Ibarra

Programming and level design: Johnny Wan

Find our github page here!

https://github.com/JohnnyXiangyu/Project-Archivist Feel free to fork the project and create your own search-based text adventure under MIT license.
